com.bit6.sdk

Class Bit6

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bit6.sdk.Bit6

  • public class Bit6
extends Object
    Bit6 is for interaction between the Bit6 framework and application

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Bit6 getInstance()
        Returns:
        Singleton instance of Bit6 class.

      • init

        public void init(Context context,
        String apikey,
        Application app,
        String gcmSenderId)
        Configures Bit6 instance, setting all required fields.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        apikey - Bit6 API key
        app - Application class of the application which uses Bit6 SDK
        gcmSenderId - This is the project number you got from the GCM API Console.

      • init

        public void init(Context context,
        String apikey,
        Application app,
        String gcmSenderId,
        int environment)
        Configures Bit6 instance, setting all required fields.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        apikey - Bit6 API key
        app - Application class of the application which uses Bit6 SDK
        gcmSenderId - This is the project number you got from the GCM API Console.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys Bit6 instance, nullifies all members and destroys all connections. Calling init() is required for using Bit6 instance next time.

      • login

        public void login(Address identity,
         String password,
         OnResponseReceived cb)
        Parameters:
        identity - User identity.
        password - User password.
        cb - CallBack object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called in UI thread.

      • signup

        public void signup(Address identity,
          String password,
          OnResponseReceived cb)
        Parameters:
        identity - User identity.
        password - User password.
        cb - CallBack object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called in UI thread.

      • isUserLoggedIn

        public boolean isUserLoggedIn()
        Checks if user loged in or not.
        Returns:
        true if user Id and token value are saved in preferences, false - otherwise.

      • getOwnIdentity

        public Address getOwnIdentity()
        Loads the identity which was used for logging in.
        Returns:
        user name which was used in order to login into account.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Deletes all saved data in preferences (user id, token, etc...) and from local database(messages).

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Address to,
               String content,
               OnResponseReceived cb)
        Creates outgoing message, saves it in local database and sending to the server.
        Parameters:
        to - is destination user name.
        content - is the text which is sent to the destination.
        cb - CallBack object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called in UI thread.

      • deleteMessage

        public void deleteMessage(String messageId,
                 OnResponseReceived cb)
        Deletes message from local DB and from the server.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The message ID which must be deleted.
        cb - CallBack object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called in UI thread.

      • getChanges

        public void getChanges()
        Gets messages from server, parses the result and saves in local database.

      • getConversations

        public Cursor getConversations()
        Retrieves a list of conversations.
        Returns:
        Cursor object which contains messages grouped by chat members user names and ordered by Messages.CREATED + " DESC".

      • getConversation

        public Cursor getConversation(String other)
        Retrieves a conversation.
        Parameters:
        other - - the user name of other chat member.
        Returns:
        Cursor object which contains incoming and outgoing messages ordered by Messages.CREATED + " ASC"

      • sendTypingNotification

        public void sendTypingNotification(Address to)
        Sends typing notification to the specified destination.
        Parameters:
        to - Destination Address

      • addMessageListener

        public void addMessageListener(MessageListener listener)
        Adds listener to Bit6 instance. The listener is called when new message or notification(typing or message update)arrives.
        Parameters:
        listener - MessageListener

      • removeMessageListener

        public void removeMessageListener(MessageListener listener)
        Removes message listener from Bit6 listeners.
        Parameters:
        listener - MessageListener

      • notifyMessageReceived

        public void notifyMessageReceived(JSONObject jsonObject)
        Notifies the activities which are registered for new messages
        Parameters:
        jsonObject -
